LanguageData.R_SeasonedMeat.label: 腌制肉
LanguageData.R_SeasonedMeat.description: 用调料除去了异味的肉，比生肉的营养稍微高一点，而且贮存时间更长。\n可以就这么吃，也可以烹调过再吃。
LanguageData.R_FreezeMochi.label: 冻米饼
LanguageData.R_FreezeMochi.description: 将米饼浸湿冷冻，然后用凉风风干。这样处理过的米饼可以贮存更长时间。\n可以就这么吃，也可以烹调过再吃。
LanguageData.ZP_RiceBranPickled.label: Nukaduke
LanguageData.ZP_RiceBranPickled.description: A preserved meal made vegetables in Nuka(rice bran).\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_DriedFish.label: Dried fish
LanguageData.ZP_DriedFish.description: A preserved food dried to keep raw fish from decaying.\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_FermentedSoybeans.label: Natto
LanguageData.ZP_FermentedSoybeans.description: Fermented Japanese food fermented Soybean with Bacillus Natto. \nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
